name: Doll in the Hall
description:
Can you survive the Doll in the Hall?
Doll in the Hall is a survival-horror game based on Elf on the Shelf. 

Story: There’s only 1 day until Christmas and you’re a child who just can’t wait! While your parents leave you alone at night, they have one of Santa’s helpers (the Doll in the Hall) watch you. Beware though, this doll is not as friendly as most. Slight infractions will add to your naughtiness meter, and if it reaches the maximum…well let’s just say you don’t want that to happen.
Features:
  • A house to explore and do chores in  
  • Super atmospheric
  • A creepy elf that watches your every move
  • Improved dynamic horror system
  • Built in 5 hours
  • Once the doll is summoned...there's no escape!
Controls: WASD to move
CTRL to crouch Mouse to look around 1 for flashlight E to interact Q to examine TAB to open your inventory

I'm trying to fund my next game so any donations, no matter how small, would be greatly appreciated ^_^

Let me know of any bugs and I will try to fix them ASAP! I had some trouble getting it too build (and it was late at night lol) so it might be a tad janky.

**THERE IS A KNOWN BUG THAT FREEZES YOU IN CROUCH IF YOU'RE CROUCHING WHEN YOU MAX OUT YOUR NAUGHTINESS METER; PLEASE BE AWARE OF THIS WHILE I WORK ON FIXING IT**
